comment: The data are totals. To calc per capita arrests, Divide the tot arrests by total white population, giving .0251 arrests per capita, arrests per whites. For blacks, .056 arrests per capita, arrests per blacks. Blacks commit more crime, x more.
amr:
# ::snt The data are totals. To calc per capita arrests, Divide the tot arrests by total white population, giving .0251 arrests per capita, arrests per whites. For blacks, .056 arrests per capita, arrests per blacks. Blacks commit more crime, x more.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / total-01
            :ARG1 (d / data))
      :snt2 (d2 / divide-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p / population
                  :ARG1-of (w / white-02)
                  :ARG2-of t))
      :ARG2 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / arrest-01
                  :ARG1-of (r / rate-entity-91
                        :ARG2 (p2 / person)))
            :op2 (g / give-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (a3 / arrest-01
                        :ARG1 (p3 / person
                              :ARG1-of (w2 / white-02))
                        :ARG1-of (r2 / rate-entity-91
                              :ARG2 p2))))
      :snt3 (a4 / and
            :op1 (a5 / arrest-01
                  :ARG1 (p4 / person
                        :ARG1-of (b / black-05))
                  :ARG1-of (r3 / rate-entity-91
                        :ARG2 (p5 / person)))
            :op2 (a6 / arrest-01
                  :ARG1 p4
                  :ARG1-of (r4 / rate-entity-91
                        :ARG2 p5))
            :op3 (a7 / arrest-01
                  :ARG1 (p6 / person
                        :ARG1-of (b2 / black-05))
                  :ARG1-of (r5 / rate-entity-91
                        :ARG2 p5)))
      :snt4 (c / commit-02
            :ARG0 (p7 / person
                  :ARG1-of (b3 / black-05))
            :ARG1 (c2 / crime-02
                  :quant (m2 / more))))
